subject: Using Decorator
msgSnippet: I would like a decorator in my tests for run the methods setUp and tearDown just one time for all methods in the test case. I know that exist a TestDecorator
messageBody:
I would like a decorator in my tests for run the methods setUp and tearDown just one time for all methods in the test case.
I know that exist a TestDecorator in the JUnit framework but I don't know how use it.
Can anyone help me?
